We wish to inform you that the Central Bank of the UAE has issued new regulations for Insurance Brokers, dated July 25, 2024. According to these regulations, Insurance Brokers are prohibited from collecting premiums under any circumstances. These regulations will come into effect on February 15, 2025.

In compliance with these regulations, we will cease collecting premiums effective January 1, 2025. Henceforth, all premium payments should be made directly to the insurance providers as per the details mentioned in the insurance policy invoice you receive from the insurance company.

 

A negative account balance may indicate a refund or another issue that requires clarification. Please contact our team promptly to address this issue.

 

Kindly ignore this email if you have already settled the due invoices and request to share the payment proof along with allocation details.

 

 

Best Regards

 

Accounts Department

We wish to inform you that the Central Bank of the UAE has issued new regulations for Insurance Brokers, dated July 25, 2024. According to these regulations, Insurance Brokers are prohibited from collecting premiums under any circumstances. These regulations will come into effect on February 15, 2025.

In compliance with these regulations, we will cease collecting premiums effective January 1, 2025. Henceforth, all premium payments should be made directly to the insurance providers as per the details mentioned in the insurance policy invoice you receive from the insurance company.

 

A negative account balance may indicate a refund or another issue that requires clarification. Please contact our team promptly to address this issue.

 

Kindly ignore this email if you have already settled the due invoices and request to share the payment proof along with allocation details.

 

 

Best Regards

 

Accounts Department
